channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- EmbedSocial
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- EmbedSocial

item.title: CVE-2023-0371|2024-08-02T05:10:55.602Z -- unknown -- embedsocial
item.description: The EmbedSocial WordPress plugin before 1.1.28 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
